home.title: Greenstore - Fresh Flowers & Unique Bouquets
home.description: Discover a wide range of fresh flowers, bouquets, and floral gifts at Greenstore. Your go-to destination for beautiful floral arrangements.

blogs.title: Greenstore - Flower Shop Blog & Floral Insights
blogs.description: Stay updated with the latest blog posts, tips, and floral trends from Greenstore. Explore expert advice and gardening ideas.

product_details.title: Greenstore Flower Shop
product_details.description: Explore detailed information about this beautiful flower or bouquet at Greenstore.

shopping_cart.title: Greenstore - Your Shopping Cart
shopping_cart.description: Review the items in your cart and proceed to checkout to complete your purchase at Greenstore.

checkout.title: Greenstore - Secure Checkout
checkout.description: Finalize your order and make secure payments with our easy checkout process. Confirm your purchase and delivery details.

profile.title: Greenstore - Manage Your Profile
profile.description: Access and update your account details, preferences, and order history at Greenstore.

account_details.title: Greenstore - Update Account Information
account_details.description: Modify your personal information and manage your account settings for a better shopping experience.

my_products.title: Greenstore - Manage Your Products
my_products.description: View, edit, and manage your product listings and inventory directly from your Greenstore account.

address.title: Greenstore - Update Shipping Address
address.description: Edit your shipping and billing addresses to ensure accurate delivery of your floral orders.

wishlist.title: Greenstore - Your Wishlist
wishlist.description: View and manage your favorite flowers and bouquets at Greenstore.

track_order.title: Greenstore - Track Your Order
track_order.description: Monitor the status of your order and get real-time updates on delivery progress at Greenstore.

user.title: Greenstore - User Profile
user.description: View and manage your personal information, preferences, and order history at Greenstore.

not_found.title: Greenstore - Page Not Found
not_found.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist. Return to the homepage or explore other sections.

error.title: Greenstore - Something Went Wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.

track_order.description: Your order is currently being processed. You will receive an order confirmation email shortly with the expected delivery date for your items.

hero_slice_1.title: LET'S MAKE A BETTER
hero_slice_1.subtitle: WELCOME TO GREENSTORE
hero_slice_1.description: We are an online plant shop offering a wide range of cheap and trendy plants. Use our plants to create an unique Urban Jungle. Order your favorite plants!

hero_slice_2.subtitle: WELCOME TO GREENSTORE

plant_features.plant_renovation_description: Our plants grow in a safe environment.
